content: **knitted blanket for baby in drops sky piece is knitted with lace pattern and garter stitch ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern skip-008-by yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx width 52-63 cm height 70-80 cm **yarn** drops sky from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 200-300 g colour 18 powder pink **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
